newsitem.title: EU: OFFICIAL JOURNAL CONTENTS - OJ L 48 OF FEBRUARY 19, 1997.
newsitem.headline: OFFICIAL JOURNAL CONTENTS - OJ L 48 OF FEBRUARY 19, 1997.

text.p: Decision No 292/97/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 19 December 1996 on the maintenance of national laws prohibiting the use of certain additives in the production of certain specific foodstuffs END OF DOCUMENT.
